1.1.name: wordpress/easycode
1.1.description:
A great tool for programmers' blog. Insert programming code in your posts.

With the help of the plugin you can share your programming code in a better way. The plugin provides your website with a more friendly and more convenient interface with the abilities to collapse code areas, copy code and edit code.

The latest version is 1.2. There are some new features : * Customizing the colors and size * Allow using simple HTML tags. * Analyze code smartlier.

GUIDANCE: How to insert code in your posts? Place use [code]¡­[/code] :just put your code between them. You are allowed to use simple HTML tags such as <strong><i><span><u><big><small>
